name: circleback
title: Circleback
description: Record, view, and search meetings in Circleback
author: arguiot

commands.name: new-meeting
commands.title: New Meeting
commands.description: Record a new meeting in Circleback.

commands.name: open-last-meeting
commands.title: Open Last Meeting
commands.description: Open your most recent meeting in Circleback.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
